DOC.brief_summary: The herbal products on reduction of radiation-induced dermatitis in patients with breast cancer
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Herbal Products on Reduction of Radiation-induced Dermatitis in Breast Cancer Patients
DOC.detailed_description: To compare the effect of each herb extracts to protect the skin from the adverse effects of radiation therapy in patients with breast cancer with herbal extract products.
DOC.criteria: Aged 20 years old or older, Diagnosed with Breast cancer On course of external Radiation therapy Pregnant Previously underwent external Radiation therapy Illiterate
